sexAction.title: Stars
sexAction.tooltip: Decide to finish off the two iced assholes with a helping of gold star spinkles.

description.text: Looking between the three pots, you quickly decide that gold star sprinkles are going to be the best. Taking a big pinch of the sugary little stars, you liberally scatter them over the two iced doughnuts before you. The brightly coloured decoration complements the shiny white and pink icing, and in no time at all you're left looking at a mouth-watering pair of iced-and-sprinkled doughnuts.
